Name: Ultimo
Description: Ultimo was a robotic construct that was developed several thousand years ago on an unknown world, which the Mandarin eventually discovered and claimed as his own creation.
FirstComicDescription: Presenting: The raw, pulsating power of the great Golden Avenger! Iron Man's mightiest foes strike: Mandarin, Unicorn, Sunfire, and the mysterious Yellow Claw! This is it! The story we had to call confrontation!
